text: He imanadaragana, tomara n'yayera upara pratisthita thaka; allahara oyaste n'yayasangata saksyadana kara, tate tomadera nijera ba pita-matara athaba nikatabarti atniya-sbajanera yadi ksati haya tabu'o. Ke'u yadi dhani kimba daridra haya, tabe allaha tadera subhakankhi tomadera ca'ite besi. Ata'eba, tomara bicara karate giye ripura kamana-basanara anusarana karo na. Ara yadi tomara ghuriye-pemciye katha bala kimba pasa katiye ya'o, tabe allaha tomadera yabatiya kaja karma samparke'i abagata.
